sample_docs: Brands that Trust Us IXM Link Partners 7 Years Of innovation has put Invixium among the top biometric access control brands in the world. In this short span, we have launched 5 beautiful products and an enterprise level software. 300+ Customers Across the globe are reselling Invixium products purchased either through regional distributors or directly in regions where we don't have distributors. 60+ Countries In the world have at least 1 Invixium unit deployed which is providing security or time tracking for organizations, using biometrics.
